inclusion.criterion: Successful TAVR of a native aortic valve stenosis
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Atrial fibrillation (AF), current or previous, with an ongoing indication for oral anticoagulant treatment
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known bleeding diathesis (such as but not limited to platelet count ≤ 50,000/mm3 at screening, hemoglobin level < 8.5 g/dL or < 5.3 mmol/l, history of intracranial hemorrhage, or subdural hematoma)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinically overt stroke within the last three months
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis, bicuspid aortic valve, and tobacco abuse. He also has hypertension and hyperlipidemia.
